title: Shopping List - SoftList
summary: Create and manage your shopping list became much easier.
developerAddress: Rua Joaquim Nabuco, 235 - CEP 88802200 - Criciúma - Santa Catarina - Brasil.
description: SoftList offers an extensive set of features with a modern and intuitive visual.Speed ​​and convenience.Create your shopping list quickly using our product catalog and with the help of the autocomplete resource.Simple and complete.You can create lists by just adding the names of the products or complete lists by adding price, unit of measure, category, observation and photo.Follow your purchase.Add the price of the products and let SoftList calculate the total purchase for you.Purchase historyBy saving the history of your purchases, you can perform an analysis of your expenses, and if you have purchased the same product in different stores, perform price comparisons.Control your expenses.SoftList is the only shopping list app that has reports and charts to analyze your expenses. You can analyze various information, such as which product or category had more expenses.Just save the history of your purchases and generate reports.Cloud services.With cloud services you can synchronize your data between multiple devices, share lists with others and keep all your data saved in the cloud through automatic backups.To use the cloud services you need to create a SoftList account. You can create this account at any time, even after creating your lists.Features:- Register and manage your shopping lists. - Catalog of products with images. - Register items manually, using voice command or by scanning the barcode. - Add images to the products. - Products arranged by categories. - Possibility to define the order in which categories will be displayed. - Share your shopping list by email, SMS or WhatsApp. - Copy and move items between lists. - Add price to the products and see the total purchase.- Save your purchase history.- Reports for monitoring expenses.- Reports to compare prices.- Share lists with others.- Automatic backups using cloud services.- Synchronize your data between multiple devices.SoftList is now avaliable on Android Wear smartwatches.
descriptionHTML:
SoftList offers an extensive set of features with a modern and intuitive visual.

Speed ​​and convenience.
Create your shopping list quickly using our product catalog and with the help of the autocomplete resource.

Simple and complete.
You can create lists by just adding the names of the products or complete lists by adding price, unit of measure, category, observation and photo.

Follow your purchase.
Add the price of the products and let SoftList calculate the total purchase for you.

Purchase history
By saving the history of your purchases, you can perform an analysis of your expenses, and if you have purchased the same product in different stores, perform price comparisons.

Control your expenses.
SoftList is the only shopping list app that has reports and charts to analyze your expenses. You can analyze various information, such as which product or category had more expenses.
Just save the history of your purchases and generate reports.

Cloud services.
With cloud services you can synchronize your data between multiple devices, share lists with others and keep all your data saved in the cloud through automatic backups.
To use the cloud services you need to create a SoftList account. You can create this account at any time, even after creating your lists.

Features:
- Register and manage your shopping lists.
- Catalog of products with images.
- Register items manually, using voice command or by scanning the barcode.
- Add images to the products.
- Products arranged by categories.
- Possibility to define the order in which categories will be displayed.
- Share your shopping list by email, SMS or WhatsApp.
- Copy and move items between lists.
- Add price to the products and see the total purchase.
- Save your purchase history.
- Reports for monitoring expenses.
- Reports to compare prices.
- Share lists with others.
- Automatic backups using cloud services.
- Synchronize your data between multiple devices.

SoftList is now avaliable on Android Wear smartwatches.
comments: I'm not a big fan of the newest update but it's still the best shopping app out there. The pictures make all the difference so that instead of seeing "Milk" on the list, you can see exactly what milk to get. The new round photos though are a problem. Most of my stuff comes in square boxes rather than round ones (except a few cheeses) and I get messed in the store up trying to find the round box of Cheerios. ;)   Sync between devices is perfect (and automatic) so I'll give it the sixth star.
This is the first time I installed this shopping and found out that we can add items to the database but we  can't search for pictures online. What a shame. So only 3 stars
Easy to use and very useful.

It's almost perfect! Shame it doesn't allow you to delete multiple grocery items from the main list,  as it comes with a presaved list full of items I would never purchase, so I have to go through and individually select each one and delete! Would be so much easier if you could select multiple items to delete at a time
Easy to use as a shopping list...cart price included.
really DISLIKE the update.  Being able to EDIT items AS YOU ADD THEM TO YOUR LIST was why I liked it.  It's such a PAIN IN THE ASS. Entirely why I left Listonic.
recentChanges: - Added field in the Product Catalog for quick insertion of items.
- Added option to display the amounts in expenses report.
- Added option to create lists and products separated by store. (The option needs to be enabled in the settings.)
